original_text: All God's people meet together there. They are like his most important sons. They belong in heaven because God has written down their names. You have come to God himself, who will judge all people. You have come to the place where the spirits of God's people are. Those people have become right with God. God has now finished his work in them. All God's people meet together there. They are like his most important sons. They belong in heaven because God has written down their names. You have come to God himself, who will judge all people. You have come to the place where the spirits of God's people are. Those people have become right with God. God has now finished his work in them.
korean_text: 하늘에 기록된 장자들의 모임과 교회와 만민의 심판자이신 하나님과 및 온전하게 된 의인의 영들과

sentences.original_text: All God's people meet together there.
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님의 모든 백성이 그곳에서 함께 만납니다.

sentences.original_text: They are like his most important sons.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그분의 가장 중요한 아들들과 같습니다.

sentences.original_text: They belong in heaven because God has written down their names.
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님이 그들의 이름을 기록하셨기 때문에 그들은 하늘에 속합니다.

sentences.original_text: You have come to God himself,
You have come to the place
where the spirits of God's people are.
Those people have become right with God.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 사람들은 하나님과 온전한 관계를 가지게 되었습니다.

sentences.original_text: God has now finished his work in them.
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 그들 안에서 자신의 일을 이미 마치셨습니다.

sentences.original_text: All God's people meet together there.
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님의 모든 백성이 그곳에서 함께 만납니다.

sentences.original_text: They are like his most important sons.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그분의 가장 중요한 아들들과 같습니다.

sentences.original_text: They belong in heaven because God has written down their names.
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님이 그들의 이름을 기록하셨기 때문에 그들은 하늘에 속합니다.

sentences.original_text: You have come to God himself,
You have come to the place
where the spirits of God's people are.
Those people have become right with God.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 사람들은 하나님과 온전한 관계를 가지게 되었습니다.

sentences.original_text: God has now finished his work in them.
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 그들 안에서 자신의 일을 이미 마치셨습니다.
